WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Use 
```php
$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0)
            ->setCellValueExplicit('A1', '2:0');
```
Note that this isn't an issue (this is not a bug that you're reporting) so should have been asked on the discussion board
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I am new in using PhpExcel and I have problem with storing string "2:0" in cell, it's always converted to  02:00:00 AM. How should I avoid this string-to-time conversion?

tnx in advance
WorkItem.Summary: How to prevent writing string as time?
